## Introduction

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggimage)

```


```{r}
d <- read.csv("/Users/ajpelu/Downloads/variation_abi.csv", sep = ",", dec = ",")

soc <- read_csv("data/")

pinus_icons <- data.frame(
  sp_code = c("halepensis", "pinaster", "nigra", "sylvestris"),
  image = c("data/image_pinus/hal.png",
            "data/image_pinus/pin.png",
            "data/image_pinus/nigra.png",
            "data/image_pinus/syl.png"))



dd <- d |> inner_join(pinus_icons)

dd |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=elev, y = per_abi_gradient, fill=sp_code, colour = sp_code)) +
  geom_image(aes(image = image), size = .1)



```
